Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in great location, beds so comfortable, best nights sleep for ages!”

Reviews.Content: advantage book ahead special summer rate enjoyed business class hotel night 3 people bathroom extra extra nice amenities hairdryer conveniently located near metro nice neighborhood negative wireless speed internet overpriced somewhat slow money staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, good location, not the best service, bad air condition”

Reviews.Content: ive deal lastminutecom paid nights third free otherwise id satisfied stayed july super hot air conditions cooling ive move werent nice arguing getting key realised ac checked receptionist refused print boarding pass giving excuse computer sending emails moment dont expect getting extra mile desk

Reviews.Title: “Absolutley brilliant - cannot fault it!”
Reviews.Author: happystimpy
Reviews.Content: trip barcelona girlfriends birthday 3 nights saturday tuesday fot hotel due reviews tripadvisor wasnt disappointed arrived hotel 10 night happy comfortable modern staff spoke english helped hotel short walk main roads las ramblas convinient centre busy found perfect getting walking harbour day metro available hotel clean probably safest late night stay visited majority gaudis buildings main sites central barcelona didnt restaurant bar looked nice door restaurant called balthazar brilliant food decently priced restaurants bars local 5 minutes offering traditional spanish chinese italian travelled lot europe barcelona honestly favourite trips hotel key definitely reccomend returned barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed barcelona 3 nights vacation perfect hotel location excellent 2 mins walk metro stop 2 stops sites local neighborhood lots restaurants shops choose safe hotel staff extremely helpful beyond help 100 recommend hotel
